findings.details: Inline thumbnails in news posts load without explicit lazy/priority hints; can improve perceived performance and avoid layout jank.
No obvious placeholder or http links detected in key templates and recent posts.
News pages embed media from G1 CDN; preconnect/dns-prefetch can speed up image fetches.
News layouts are structured with cards and strong hierarchy.

recommendations: Add lazy-loading defaults and subtle loading affordances for news inline thumbnails.
Preconnect to the most common news image CDNs on news pages.
